name: Fight Fire With Water!
description:
This is a 2 player game where each player takes up one side of the keyboard. Do you choose WaterBoy and save the flames? Or be Flamo and set them yourself?

This game is most enjoyed with two people (in case that wasn't obvious).

Made for The Butterscotch Shenanijam within 48 hours!

Theme: Burn it Down

Achievements: Mozart, Tango
